languages.text: "Я слышу в твоих словах о Драйвстеме не то презрение, не то недовольство..."
"The way you speak of Drivestem... I hear a hint of either contempt or resentment."
languages.original_text: "Я слышу в твоих словах о Драйвстеме не то презрение, не то недовольство..."

traits.locale_text: "In the way you speak of Drivestem, I hear a hint of either contempt or vexation..."
"In the way you speak of Drivestem, I hear a hint of either contempt or vexation..."
"The way you speak of Drivestem... I hear a hint of either contempt or resentment."
"The way you speak of Drivestem... I hear a hint of either contempt or resentment."
"The way you speak of Drivestem... I hear a hint of either contempt or resentment."

languages.text: “你提到德莱夫斯塔时的语气……我在其中听到了一丝轻蔑，或是怨恨。”
languages.original_text: "The way you speak of Drivestem... I hear a hint of either contempt or resentment."

traits.locale_text: “你提到德莱夫斯塔时的语气……我在其中听到了一丝轻蔑，或是怨恨。”

languages.text: «Por cómo habla de Drivestem... noto un toque de desprecio o de resentimiento».
languages.original_text: "The way you speak of Drivestem... I hear a hint of either contempt or resentment."

traits.locale_text: «Por cómo habla de Drivestem... noto un toque de desprecio o de resentimiento».

languages.text: 「ドライブステムを軽蔑しているか恨んでいるかのような話し方だな…」
languages.original_text: "The way you speak of Drivestem... I hear a hint of either contempt or resentment."

traits.locale_text: 「ドライブステムを軽蔑しているか恨んでいるかのような話し方だな…」

languages.text: "In der Art, wie Ihr von Drivestem sprecht ... höre ich einen Anflug von Geringschätzung oder Abneigung."
languages.original_text: "The way you speak of Drivestem... I hear a hint of either contempt or resentment."

traits.locale_text: "In der Art, wie Ihr von Drivestem sprecht ... höre ich einen Anflug von Geringschätzung oder Abneigung."

languages.text: « Chaque fois que vous parlez de Drivestem... je perçois comme une once de mépris ou de ressentiment. »
languages.original_text: "The way you speak of Drivestem... I hear a hint of either contempt or resentment."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque fois que vous parlez de Drivestem... je perçois comme une once de mépris ou de ressentiment. »

languages.text: "Drivestem'i öyle anlatıyorsun ki... Sesinde sanki bir horgörü veya dargınlık sezdim."
languages.original_text: "The way you speak of Drivestem... I hear a hint of either contempt or resentment."

traits.locale_text: "Drivestem'i öyle anlatıyorsun ki... Sesinde sanki bir horgörü veya dargınlık sezdim."
